transcript.title: Nola Marino re-appointed as Chief Government Whip
transcript.content:
I am pleased to announce the re-appointment of Ms Nola Marino as the Chief Government Whip.

Nola will continue to perform this vitally important role with great skill. She is held in the highest esteem by her colleagues and I greatly value her counsel and support.

The full House whips team will be announced when there is clarity about the result in the seat of Herbert.

I also thank Brett Whiteley for his service as Government Whip.Â
